headline: Oracle Faces AI Lawsuits As Federal Cloud Contracts Expand
summary: Multiple securities fraud class action lawsuits have been filed against Oracle, alleging misleading statements about AI infrastructure capital spending and related financial risks. The cases focus on disclosures around major data center investments, debt exposure, and expected revenue tied to Oracle's AI infrastructure plans. At the same time, Oracle has continued to win large US government cloud contracts, including deals with the US Air Force and the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid...

headline: U.S. launches Peace Corps-backed ‘Tech Corps’ to help export AI, counter China
summary: As part of efforts to spread its global AI footprint and counter China, Washington has announced a new "tech corps."

headline: Software stocks are sliding. Is it time to 'buy the dip'?
summary: Shares of Microsoft, Oracle and Salesforce are sliding as investors debate whether AI will disrupt or destroy software firms.
